duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for managing the daily duties of the Guest Relations department.
Act as the primary point of contact for guests looking for pre-arrival assistance.
Handle all VIP arrivals and points of service, including room inspections, meet and greet, in-stay follow-up, and fond farewell.
Manage hotel amenity program and ensure the highest quality amenities are given to guests with thoughtful consideration of guests' needs.
Be knowledgeable of all job duties of a Front Desk Agent and assist as necessary.
Communicate effectively and efficiently with relevant departments and speak using clear and professional language.
Provide consistent and timely follow-up with guest complaints.
Keep track of and respond to online guest surveys and reviews.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Hospitality, Tourism, or a related field (Certification in Hotel Management is a plus)
